column4: I am using Nvidia restricted driver in Ubuntu 8.04, the version is 169.12, is this really the newest version in restricted respository??
yes that is what I am wondering, the 169.12 is getting old
that's hardy? If so, you can try using envyng-gtk, but see the following:
it is, but envyng-gtk is in the official repos, and some people i trust have (grudgingly) said it works
